name: Fabric
description: Used to craft medical supplies and shields. Can be used to slowly restore small amounts of health.

name: Tick Pod
description: Can be recycled into crafting materials.

name: Explosive Mixture
description: A volatile crafting component.

name: Dog Collar
description: After all this time, you can still smell the goodness.

name: Torn Blanket
description: Can be recycled into fabric.

name: Lemon
description: Can be consumed for a small amount of stamina.

name: Apricot
description: A sun ripe apricot. Can be consumed for a small amount of stamina.

name: Metal Parts
description: Used to craft a wide range of items. Used to craft: Launcher Ammo, Hairpin, Heavy Ammo, Ferro, Kettle

name: Rubber Parts
description: Scrap rubber pieces for crafting. Used to craft: Ferro, Kettle, Looting Mk. 1, Shield Recharger, Stitcher

name: Plastic Parts
description: Scrap plastic pieces for crafting. Used to craft: Hairpin, Light Shield, Looting Mk. 1, Light Impact Grenade, Extended Shotgun Mag I

name: Voltage Converter
description: Used in crafting. Used to craft: Heavy Shield, Showstopper

name: ARC Motion Core
description: Obtained from ARC enemies or activities. Used to craft components. Can be recycled into ARC Alloy. Used to craft: Magnetic Accelerator

name: Toaster
description: Can be recycled into crafting materials.

name: ARC Circuitry
description: Obtained from ARC enemies or activities. Used to craft components. Can be recycled into ARC Alloy. Used to craft: Medium Shield, Power Rod

name: Motor
description: A small electric motor, useful for various devices.

tip: The Queen Reactor is a legendary item only acquired by defeating The Queen that can be recycled into crafting materials.
name: Queen Reactor
description: Can be recycled into crafting materials.

name: Wires
tip: Wires are an uncommon item used to craft weapon mods that can be recycled into crafting materials.
description: Used to craft a wide range of items. Can be recycled into crafting materials. Used to craft: Blaze Grenade Trap, Smoke Grenade Trap, Lure Grenade Trap, Gas Grenade Trap, Muzzle Brake I

name: Hornet Driver
tip: The Hornet Driver is a rare item is dropped by Hornets that can be recycled into crafting materials.
description: Can be thrown and will briefly stun nearby targets

name: Fried Motherboard
description: Can be recycled into crafting materials.

name: Rusted Tools
description: A set of tools, rusted but still usable for crafting.

name: Wasp Driver
tip: The Wasp Driver is a rare item is dropped by Wasps that can be recycled into crafting materials.
description: Can be recycled into ARC Alloy. Can be thrown, and will explode if shot.

name: Rusted Gear
description: Can be recycled into crafting materials.

name: Sentinel Part
description: A salvaged component from a Sentinel unit.

name: Synthesized Fuel
description: A canister of synthetic fuel blend.

name: Fireball Burner
description: Can be recycled into ARC Alloy. Can be thrown to create small fires.

name: Laboratory Reagents
description: A set of chemical reagents used in laboratory experiments.

name: Syringe
description: Used to craft medical supplies. Can be recycled into plastic. Used to craft: Vita Shot

name: Antiseptic
description: Used to craft medical supplies. Can be recycled into chemicals. Used to craft: Sterilized Bandage, Vita Spray, Vita Shot

name: Snitch Scanner
description: Can be recycled into ARC Alloy. Can be thrown to call in ARC.

name: Rusted Shut Medical Kit
description: A medical kit rusted shut, its contents unknown.

name: Spring
description: A tightly wound coil of metal, useful for crafting mechanisms.

name: Heavy Gun Parts
description: Used to craft weapons. Used to craft: Vulcano, Hullcracker, Bettina, Complex Gun Parts

name: ARC Alloy
description: Obtained from ARC enemies or activities, or by recycling certain ARC parts. Used to craft components. Used to craft: Light Shield, ARC Motion Core, ARC Circuitry

name: Ferro I
description: Packs a punch, but must be reloaded between every shot.

name: Light Ammo
description: Light bullets used mainly with SMGs and light handguns. Compatible with: Burletta, Stitcher, Kettle, Hairpin, Bobcat

name: Heavy Ammo
description: Compatible with: Ferro, Anvil, Bettina

name: Medium Ammo
description: Compatible with: Rattler, Tempest, Arpeggio, Renegade, Torrente

name: Sterilized Bandage
description: A medical item that gradually restores a large amount of health over time.

name: Lure Grenade
description: A noise device that sticks to surfaces, distracting nearby ARC machines and drawing their fire.

name: Jump Mine
description: A proximity triggered mine that pops up and explodes, dealing damage to anything within its radius.

name: Ferro IV
description: Packs a punch, but must be reloaded between every shot.

name: Blaze Grenade
description: A grenade that detonates on impact, covering an area in fire that deals damage over time.

name: Apreggio IV
description: A 3-round burst assault rifle with decent damage output and accuracy.
flavorText: Somewhat effective against ARC armor plating

name: Rubber Duck
description: Always there to lend an ear, should you need it. Can be thrown to create noise.

name: ARC Powercell
description: Valuable resource that drops from all ARC enemies. Used to craft: Shield Recharger Can be used to repair shields.

name: Water Filter
description: A portable filtration device for purifying water.

name: Water Pump

name: Deflated Football
description: Just by looking at this, you too start to feel slightly deflated.

name: Empty Wine Bottle

name: Snap Hook

name: Tactical Mk. 1
description: Basic tactical augment. More Quick Use slots for more tactical choice, but limited survivability and slightly lower looting potential.

name: Tactical Mk. 2
description: Adds more backpack space and an extra utility item slot.

name: Combat Mk. 1
description: Basic combat augment. Supports stronger shields, but with limited backpack capacity and Quick Use slots.

name: Combat Mk. 2
description: A Combat augment more focused on maneuverability than absorbing damage.

effects.Restores: 1 health every 5 seconds. When damage is taken, the effect is paused for 30 seconds.

description: Quick and accurate, but has low bullet velocity and takes a long time to reload.

name: Smoke Grenade
description: A grenade that creates a lingering smoke cloud on impact, blocking visibility from ARC and other Raiders.

name: Lure Grenade Trap
description: A laser trip wire that detonates a Lure Grenade.

name: Radio Renegade
description: A new cosmetic will be added to your collection.

name: Burgerboy
description: A new cosmetic will be added to your collection.

name: Vulcano III
description: Has good bullet spread but sharp falloff.

name: Rocket Thruster
description: Can be recycled into crafting materials.

name: Poster of Natural Wonders
description: If you stand close and squint your eyes, it's like the world never came crumbling down.

name: Il Toro Blueprint
description: Has a large bullet spread, sharp falloff, and high damage output.

name: Compensator II Blueprint
description: Moderately reduces per-shot dispersion.

name: Light Gun Parts Blueprint
description: Assorted spare parts used for pistols and SMGs.

name: Smoke Grenade Trap
description: A laser trip wire that detonates a Smoke Grenade.

name: Complex Gun Parts Blueprint
description: Used to craft advanced weapons.

name: Lightweight Stock Blueprint
description: Moderately improves ADS & draw speed.

name: Explosive Compound
description: Used to craft explosives. Used to craft: Wolfpack, Explosive Mine, Blaze Grenade, Heavy Fuze Grenade

name: Shotgun Silencer
description: Moderately reduces the amount of noise produced when firing.

name: Il Toro II
description: Has a large bullet spread, sharp falloff, and high damage output.

name: Green Light Stick Blueprint
description: A throwable chemical light that illuminates the area around it.

name: Torn Book
description: What pages remain speak of chosen heroes, vampires, and lots of longing glances.

name: Fertilizer
description: May be worth a few coins.

name: Damaged Rocketeer Driver
description: Can be recycled into crafting materials. Can be found in ARC

name: Turbo Pump
description: Can be recycled into crafting materials.

name: Moss
description: Can be used to regain a small amount of health. Used to craft: Defibrillator

name: Bandage
description: A medical item that gradually restores health over time.

name: Tagging Grenade
description: A grenade that detonates after a delay, tagging Raiders and ARC enemies in an area, allowing you to briefly track their location.

name: Looting Mk. 1
description: Basic looting augment. More backpack slots and weight capacity, but low defensive and tactical capability.

name: Muzzle Brake I
description: Slightly reduces both vertical recoil & horizontal recoil. Compatible with: Rattler, Ferro, Burletta, Stitcher, Tempest

name: Rattler I
description: A cheap offensive option, but has to be reloaded 2 bullets at a time.

name: Painted Box
description: May be worth a few coins.

name: Music Box
description: Worth a small fortune.

name: Hairpin I
description: Has a built-in silencer. Great for stealth, but tricky in combat.

name: Looting Mk. 2
description: Significantly increases looting potential; adds slots for trinkets. Automatically throws off attached Ticks after 1s.

name: Looting Mk. 3 (Cautious)
description: A looting augment that swaps some carry capacity to increase survivability. Upon Shield break, automatically administers a weak Adrenaline Shot. Has a fixed cooldown.

name: Angled Grip I
description: Slightly reduces horizontal recoil. Compatible with: Tempest, Arpeggio, Kettle, Ferro, Hullcracker

name: Extended Shotgun Mag I
description: Slightly extends the ammo capacity of shotguns. Compatible with: Il Toro, Vulcano

name: Shotgun Choke I
description: Slightly reduces base dispersion. Compatible with: Il Toro, Vulcano

name: Vertical Grip I
description: Slightly reduces vertical recoil. Compatible with: Tempest, Arpeggio, Kettle, Ferro, Hullcracker

name: Lightweight Stock
description: Moderately improves ADS & draw speed. Compatible with: Arpeggio, Kettle, Ferro, Renegade, Hullcracker

name: Bettina I
description: Has slow fire rate and high damage output.

name: Launcher Ammo
description: Anti-ARC payloads used mainly by the Hullcracker. Compatible with: Hullcracker

name: Shotgun Ammo
description: Compatible with: Il Toro, Vulcano

name: Torrente Blueprint
description: Has a large ammo capacity, but is only accurate while crouched.

name: Anvil Blueprint
description: Has high damage output and headshot damage, but slow handling.

name: Anvil I
description: Has high damage output and headshot damage, but slow handling.

name: Osprey Blueprint
description: Has reliable damage output and accuracy.

name: Venator Blueprint
description: Fires two shots at a time.

name: Extended Medium Mag III Blueprint
description: Significantly extends the ammo capacity of compataible weapons that use medium ammo.

name: Muzzle Brake II Blueprint
description: Moderately reduces both vertical recoil & horizontal recoil.
